pricing_intelligence.vs_ih_tbilisi: Beka's 1050 GEL/3mo = 350 GEL/mo equivalent — same as IH monthly rate. But Beka's uses 25 native speakers vs IH's mix. Value proposition is native-speaker access at IH-equivalent pricing.
pricing_intelligence.vs_british_council: Beka's 19.4 GEL/hr vs BC from 12-31 GEL/hr. Comparable. But Beka's includes native speaker for every class — BC doesn't guarantee this.
pricing_intelligence.vs_emcan: Beka's ~1050 GEL/3mo vs EMCAN 320 GEL/6wk. EMCAN is cheaper per course but shorter duration. Beka's offers more total hours and native speakers.
